title: IGAQ Brochure
description: A brochure designed for IGAQ, a company that provides quality assurance services to the food industry.

text: The IGAQ brochure was designed to introduce and promote an app that provides a safe, supportive space for the LGBTQIA+ community. The app allows users to ask questions, share personal stories, and access educational resources on LGBTQIA+ topics. The brochure’s goal was to highlight the app’s features and introduce the designers and developers.
